text: We had a wonderful stay at the Sandpiper Hotel! The room was clean and comfortable, and the atmosphere was relaxing. The staff were very friendly and helpful throughout our stay. A special thanks to Rohit, who assisted us — he was professional, kind, and made sure we had everything we needed. Great service overall. Highly recommended!

Location is so awesome.
Best value for our money.
This is a Budget hotel and my review is best on our experience for a 3 night stay. The staff we all very kind and helpful. Excellent service.
Rohit made sure we were comfortable with our stay n service. Highly recommend. The hotel is clean throughout.

Great place. In the heart of little Indian close proximity to a Rochor MRT. You can walk to the MRT in like 2 minutes.

Overall customer service was very nice. They are professional and kind.

Been staying here every single time am in SG and it’s great!

Great Stay for Families with an Infant!

Sandpiper Hotel was clean, comfortable, and perfect for traveling with a baby. The room was quiet, the AC was just right, and the bed was cozy. Located in Little India, it was super convenient for food, shops, and MRT access. Plenty of places nearby for baby essentials. Great value and highly recommended for families!

This nice, very clean, highly budget friendly and comfortable hotel we found in Little India near two MRT stations was just amazing. The staff is very well behaved, friendly and guided us correctly about our queries and rooms are clean and cosy. The hotel is near budget shopping areas as well. Walking distance to everything you need , good food, restaurants and Bars. I would surely recommend this ally Friends and family....Sendpiper Hotel, perak road, Little India
